description.en:
LightBit aims to disrupt the crypto industry by lowering transaction fees for wallet to wallet exchanges.

LightBit is a peer-to-peer Internet currency offering instant, low cost fees to users around the globe.
LightBit is an open source, universal payment system that is fully decentralized without any governing central oversight

The network is secured by cryptography and enables people to have control of their own funds. LightBit has fast confirmations providing a better user experience.
